dt: {bc}a device (such as a reflector) for distributing the light of a lamp evenly
{bc}a screen (as of cloth or frosted glass) for softening lighting (as in photography)
{bc}a device (such as slats at {a_link|different} angles) for deflecting air from an outlet in various directions
{bc}a device for reducing the velocity and increasing the static pressure of a fluid passing through a system

shortdef: a device (such as a reflector) for distributing the light of a lamp evenly
a screen (as of cloth or frosted glass) for softening lighting (as in photography)
